languages.text:
Мостик: Запрашиваем ответ инженариума.
Мостик: Лорд-капитан, сожалеем, но техножрецы отказываются даже обсуждать такую возможность. Это нарушение обетов Омниссии и чрезвычайно опасное предприятие.

Bridge: Requesting response from the enginarium.
Bridge: Apologies, Lord Captain, the Tech-Priests have refused even to consider such a possibility. It would be a violation of the Omnissiah's tenets and an extremely dangerous undertaking.
languages.original_text:
Мостик: Запрашиваем ответ инженариума.
Мостик: Лорд-капитан, сожалеем, но техножрецы отказываются даже обсуждать такую возможность. Это нарушение обетов Омниссии и чрезвычайно опасное предприятие.

languages.text:
Puente: Solicitando respuesta del ingeniarium.
Puente: Lo lamento, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, pero los tecnosacerdotes se niegan siquiera a considerar la posibilidad. Sería una violación de la doctrina del Omnissiah y un riesgo absurdo.
languages.original_text:
Bridge: Requesting response from the enginarium.
Bridge: Apologies, Lord Captain, the Tech-Priests have refused even to consider such a possibility. It would be a violation of the Omnissiah's tenets and an extremely dangerous undertaking.

traits.locale_text:
Puente: Solicitando respuesta del ingeniarium.
Puente: Lo lamento, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, pero los tecnosacerdotes se niegan siquiera a considerar la posibilidad. Sería una violación de la doctrina del Omnissiah y un riesgo absurdo.

languages.text:
舰桥：正在请求引擎区回应。
舰桥：很抱歉，舰长大人，技术神甫甚至根本不愿考虑这种可能性。这么做不仅会违反欧姆尼塞亚的教条，而且极其危险。
languages.original_text:
Bridge: Requesting response from the enginarium.
Bridge: Apologies, Lord Captain, the Tech-Priests have refused even to consider such a possibility. It would be a violation of the Omnissiah's tenets and an extremely dangerous undertaking.

traits.locale_text:
舰桥：正在请求引擎区回应。
舰桥：很抱歉，舰长大人，技术祭司甚至根本不愿考虑这种可能性。这么做不仅会违反欧姆尼塞亚的教条，而且极其危险。

languages.text:
ブリッジ：エンジナリウムから応答を待っています。
ブリッジ：申し訳ございません、ロード・キャプテン。技術司祭がそういった可能性を考えることすら拒否しています。万機神の教義に反し、極めて危険な行為だと判断しました。
languages.original_text:
Bridge: Requesting response from the enginarium.
Bridge: Apologies, Lord Captain, the Tech-Priests have refused even to consider such a possibility. It would be a violation of the Omnissiah's tenets and an extremely dangerous undertaking.

traits.locale_text:
ブリッジ：エンジナリウムから応答を待っています。
ブリッジ：申し訳ございません、ロード・キャプテン。技術司祭がそういった可能性を考えることすら拒否しています。万機神の教義に反し、極めて危険な行為だと判断しました。

languages.text:
Brücke: Erwarten Antwort von Maschinarium.
Brücke: Verzeiht, Lord Captain, die Techpriester weigern sich, so eine Möglichkeit auch nur zu erwägen. Es würde die Grundsätze des Omnissiah verletzen und wäre zudem extrem gefährlich.
languages.original_text:
Bridge: Requesting response from the enginarium.
Bridge: Apologies, Lord Captain, the Tech-Priests have refused even to consider such a possibility. It would be a violation of the Omnissiah's tenets and an extremely dangerous undertaking.

traits.locale_text:
Brücke: Erwarten Antwort von Maschinarium.
Brücke: Verzeiht, Lord Captain, die Techpriester weigern sich, so eine Möglichkeit auch nur zu erwägen. Es würde die Grundsätze des Omnissiah verletzen und wäre zudem extrem gefährlich.

languages.text:
Passerelle : En attente d'une réponse de la part de l'enginarium.
Passerelle : Toutes mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, les technoprêtres refusent catégoriquement d'envisager une telle possibilité. Cela serait contraire aux principes de l'Omnimessie et constituerait une entreprise extrêmement périlleuse.
languages.original_text:
Bridge: Requesting response from the enginarium.
Bridge: Apologies, Lord Captain, the Tech-Priests have refused even to consider such a possibility. It would be a violation of the Omnissiah's tenets and an extremely dangerous undertaking.

languages.text:
Köprü: Mühendishaneden cevap talep ediliyor.
Köprü: Affınıza sığınıyorum Lord Kaptan. Tekno Rahipler, böyle bir olasılığı hesaplamayı reddetti. Böyle bir eylem, Hermesih'in ilkelerine saygısızlık olarak görülürmüş ve oldukça tehlikeli bir girişimmiş.
languages.original_text:
Bridge: Requesting response from the enginarium.
Bridge: Apologies, Lord Captain, the Tech-Priests have refused even to consider such a possibility. It would be a violation of the Omnissiah's tenets and an extremely dangerous undertaking.

Köprü: Affınıza sığınıyorum Lord Kaptan. Tekno Rahipler, böyle bir olasılığı hesaplamayı reddetti. Böyle bir eylem, Hermesih'in ilkelerine saygısızlık olarak görülürmüş ve oldukça tehlikeli bir girişimmiş.
